solution_line_template: Susan works {vacation_weeks} * {work_days_per_week} = <<{vacation_weeks}*{work_days_per_week}={total_workdays_vacation}>>{total_workdays_vacation} days in two weeks.
She is taking {total_workdays_vacation} - {paid_vacation_days} = <<{total_workdays_vacation}-{paid_vacation_days}={unpaid_vacation_days}>>{unpaid_vacation_days} days of unpaid vacation.
At ${pay_per_hour} per hour, she is paid {pay_per_hour} * {hours_per_day} = $<<{pay_per_hour}*{hours_per_day}={pay_per_day}>>{pay_per_day} per day.
At ${pay_per_day} per day, Susan will miss {pay_per_day} * {unpaid_vacation_days} = $<<{pay_per_day}*{unpaid_vacation_days}={missed_pay}>>{missed_pay} on her vacation.
